metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010302 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: jhead 3.03 is affected by: Incorrect Access Control. The impact is: Denial of service. The component is: iptc.c Line 122 show_IPTC(). The attack vector is: the victim must open a specially crafted JPEG file. It was discovered that jhead did not properly handle certain crafted input. If a user were tricked into opening a malicious JPEG file, a remote attacker could cause jhead to crash.

criterions.comment: jhead: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
